logs.message: Wir haben fast ne Stunde gesucht, aber mussten entt√§uscht aufgeben :(

#2062Last of three caches today, found at 20:40 on my way back from a mountain bike trip up the Langeberg canyon. I parked my bike at GZ and started checking every tree, working my way outwards in a spiral. I was more or less giving up and walked back to my bike - and noticed something just where I parked it ...   ::|    8)   TFTC! Well hidden.
